ELP 25 N ALM 45 N 4CR 10 SSW LVS 25 NNW CAO 25 WNW SPD 25 WNW LAA 25
SSW AKO 40 WNW CDR 35 SW RAP 45 SE RAP 40 W VTN 20 S LBF 65 ESE LBL
50 W CSM 15 SW CDS 45 S MAF 30 SSE 6R6.

ELP 30 S ONM 25 SW ABQ 25 SSE 4SL 40 N SAF RTN 20 SSW LHX 25 NNW LHX
